subject: Re: [junit] catching Throwables (Was:  Should JUnit determine if assert*/fail is called in testFoo?)
msgSnippet: ... For *you*.  Chances are that somebody else will have to maintain the code _and_ tests you have written.  It may be not obvious for this person and he may
messageBody:
> agreed it is clearer. for me it's obvious that it is the same.

For *you*. Chances are that somebody else will have to maintain the
code _and_ tests you have written. It may be not obvious for this
person and he may simply delete the test if it fails and he doesn't see
the purpose of the test.

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Bossicard
www.bossicard.com
